feed.title: Gravity Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Gravity: Release 0.7.0
entry.content:
Upgrade to this version of gravity by using this container image:

ghcr.io/beryju/gravity:v0.7.0

Upgrade to the current JS API Client using

npm i gravity-api@0.7.0

Upgrade to the current Golang API Client using

go get beryju.io/gravity@v0.7.0

What's Changed

  • update background by @BeryJu in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/778
  • Fix API Role restart by @BeryJu in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/779
  • update lease when device moves to different network by @BeryJu in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/777
  • More consistent formatting by @BeryJu in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/780

Full Changelog: https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/compare/v0.6.19...v0.7.0

entry.title: New release for Gravity: Release 0.8.0
entry.content:
Upgrade to this version of gravity by using this container image:

ghcr.io/beryju/gravity:v0.8.0

Upgrade to the current JS API Client using

npm i gravity-api@0.8.0

Upgrade to the current Golang API Client using

go get beryju.io/gravity@v0.8.0

What's Changed

  • Bump docker/build-push-action from 5.0.0 to 5.1.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/784
  • Bump eslint from 8.53.0 to 8.54.0 in /web by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/782
  • Bump github.com/netdata/go.d.plugin from 0.54.1 to 0.57.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/783
  • Bump @types/codemirror from 5.60.13 to 5.60.14 in /web by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/788
  • Bump @typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin from 6.11.0 to 6.12.0 in /web by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/787
  • Bump the babel group in /web with 2 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/786
  • Bump @typescript-eslint/parser from 6.11.0 to 6.12.0 in /web by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/789
  • Bump @types/chart.js from 2.9.40 to 2.9.41 in /web by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/790
  • Bump github.com/minio/minio-go/v7 from 7.0.63 to 7.0.64 by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/785
  • Bump github.com/go-jose/go-jose/v3 from 3.0.0 to 3.0.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/792
  • Bump @types/codemirror from 5.60.14 to 5.60.15 in /web by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/793
  • correctly support CNAMEs by @BeryJu in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/794

  • Bump github.com/minio/minio-go/v7 from 7.0.64 to 7.0.65 by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/811

  • Bump @rollup/plugin-json from 6.0.1 to 6.1.0 in /web by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/833

  • Bump github/codeql-action from 2 to 3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/834
  • Bump actions/upload-artifact from 3 to 4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/836
  • Bump github.com/minio/minio-go/v7 from 7.0.65 to 7.0.66 by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/835
  • Bump the eslint group in /web with 2 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/839
  • Bump golang.org/x/crypto from 0.16.0 to 0.17.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/840
  • Bump github.com/swaggest/usecase from 1.3.0 to 1.3.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/842

Full Changelog: https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/compare/v0.7.0...v0.8.0

entry.title: New release for Gravity: Release 0.8.1
entry.content:
Upgrade to this version of gravity by using this container image:

ghcr.io/beryju/gravity:v0.8.1

Upgrade to the current JS API Client using

npm i gravity-api@0.8.1

Upgrade to the current Golang API Client using

go get beryju.io/gravity@v0.8.1

Full Changelog: https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/compare/v0.8.0...v0.8.1

entry.title: New release for Gravity: Release 0.9.0
entry.content:
Upgrade to this version of gravity by using this container image:

ghcr.io/beryju/gravity:v0.9.0

Upgrade to the current JS API Client using

npm i gravity-api@0.9.0

Upgrade to the current Golang API Client using

go get beryju.io/gravity@v0.9.0

What's Changed

  • backport form updates, fix OIDC form, remove polymer by @BeryJu in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/781
  • Remove babel again by @BeryJu in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1029
  • Rework IPAM and fix concurrent IP race conditions by @BeryJu in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1030
  • Improve tests & Fix CNAME support by @BeryJu in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1033

Full Changelog: https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/compare/v0.8.1...v0.9.0
